tool.name: SAGA.grid_spline.7
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayPOINTS False isArrayFIELD False isArrayTARGET_TEMPLATE False output_data_CATEGORIES $output_data_CATEGORIES output_data_PROPABILITY $output_data_PROPABILITY name SAGA.grid_spline.7 POINTS $POINTS FIELD $FIELD TARGET_DEFINITION $TARGET_DEFINITION TARGET_USER_SIZE $TARGET_USER_SIZE TARGET_USER_XMIN $TARGET_USER_XMIN TARGET_USER_XMAX $TARGET_USER_XMAX TARGET_USER_YMIN $TARGET_USER_YMIN TARGET_USER_YMAX $TARGET_USER_YMAX TARGET_USER_COLS $TARGET_USER_COLS TARGET_USER_ROWS $TARGET_USER_ROWS TARGET_USER_FITS $TARGET_USER_FITS TARGET_TEMPLATE $TARGET_TEMPLATE prefer $prefer response $response outputType_CATEGORIES $OutputSection_CATEGORIES.outputType_CATEGORIES transmissionMode_CATEGORIES $OutputSection_CATEGORIES.transmissionMode_CATEGORIES outputType_PROPABILITY $OutputSection_PROPABILITY.outputType_PROPABILITY transmissionMode_PROPABILITY $OutputSection_PROPABILITY.transmissionMode_PROPABILITY

param.name: POINTS
param.label: Points
param.help: Points The following data types are allowed in the txt file: vnd.google-earth.kml+xml, json, xml

param.name: FIELD
param.label: Attribute
param.help: Attribute The following data types are allowed in the txt file: csv

param.name: TARGET_USER_COLS
param.label: Columns
param.help: Number of cells in East-West direction.

param.name: TARGET_USER_ROWS
param.label: Rows
param.help: Number of cells in North-South direction.

param.name: TARGET_TEMPLATE
param.label: Target System
param.help: use this grid's system for output grids The following data types are allowed in the txt file: x-ogc-aaigrid, tiff, x-ogc-envi, png

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

section.name: OutputSection_CATEGORIES
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_CATEGORIES
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

section.name: OutputSection_PROPABILITY
section.title: Select the appropriate transmission mode for the output format

param.name: outputType_PROPABILITY
param.label: Author did not provide help for this parameter...

tool.help: The 'Multilevel B-Spline for Categories' tool is comparable to indicator Kriging except that uses the Multilevel B-spline algorithm for interpolation.
